data.event: The "Doron Baga" fish market, as of 2000, was located about six kilometres from the town.
In April 2013, over 185 people were killed and over 2000 homes in Baga were destroyed as a result of fighting between the Nigerian military and the Boko Haram Islamist group.
In January 2015, Boko Haram again attacked the town, seizing it and the military base used by a multinational force set up to fight them.
